I'm looking back on deez and I really have to say, this is a wonderful intermission, Hanamori shows off her improvements by taking the initiative to help numb the pain from Kanzaki's childhood trauma. Screw the porn though, this sauce's climax was the final panels of Page 10. "So soft... wait, Soft!?"
That was nice in a way

Just love multi-work series like these - you have the first part where feelings first form, yet they’re unaware of them. Then there’s the second part where their feelings begin to flourish and become more apparent. I can guess the third part will finally be the confession… off to read that now

Another epic part to the series that gives some solid development for our MC by taking a look at his past and what made him have such a timid and reserved nature, in addition to our FMC's growth in taking the lead when it comes to their relationship and doing it for him! Awesome development on both parts and phenomenal art and sex scenes, as expressions of love and care! Thank you Herio-Sensei!!!

More vanilla goodness with some mild humor from Heiro. For those wondering they don't do NTR so expect wholesome end. ExE doesn't want people dropping their release by pressuring one of the more popular vanilla creators to put more NTR into their releases. They're already getting pushback on the increased level of it in the recent issues. (It's why they started selling individual artist's works from the issues for 330JPY on dlsite.... sales have been cratering of the full comic).

Reading this manga made me thinking about why I help people, especially my female friend. Is it just because I love her as a friend? Or because i love her? Why do i keep helping her? Just because someday she'll go out with me, and maybe be a couple? Am i keep doing this just because i want to keep that hope alive in me? Even though she has a tom of male friends that help her the same way i do? I don't know why i keep doing this, but it helps me getting through the day, but at the same time it digs a hole in my chest that i don't know if I'll be able to fill it someday. That temporary fulfillment that i get by comforting her, by being with her when she cries or when se breaks up with some guy, it's like a drug to me, and I don't know if I'm able to stop one day. I'm fucked up

Correction to some comments: This isn't a hentai doujin, it's a hentai manga. 

A doujin can be a term for people with similar interests. It is also used to describe self-published works. A doujinshi is a self-publish printed work, which includes Manga, LN, and Magazines. I guess a doujin/doujinshi's equivalent word to the west is the term "Indie".
